group_1.narration: I thought I finally made a friend...

group_1.textLeft: (My friends already told me to quit doing that!@I'm such an idiot!)

group_1.textRight: Hey...
You startled me a bit, and yeah, you were@completely lost in the clouds...
But it's not gonna make me dislike you, Aimi.
I only just met you today.
But I think you're so wonderful! [chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300201:cheek_0][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1]You're truly@in love.
I wanted to cheer you on. [chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300201:cheek_0][chara:300201:motion_100][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1]And I still do.
First, [chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300201:cheek_1][chara:300201:motion_1][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1]you have to ask him to walk home@together.
Right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... I can never find the courage to,@though.

group_1.textRight: Aimi, lift your head up. Look me right in@the eyes.
Here we gooo!
You can do it! You can do it! Aimi!@Next time for sure, you'll ask him!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yeah! Yeah, I will! I CAN do it! Thank you!
Ah, it's gotten really late. Should we get@going?

group_1.textRight: Yeah.
Ah, [chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300201:cheek_0][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1]my hands are all sticky from the cream@puffs.
Let me go wash them.

group_1.textCenter: (I've never been able to talk about this,@Magical Girl stuff and all.)
(All those heavy doubts feel way lighter.@[wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_1][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]She even gave me a cheer.)
(Hee hee, tomorrow I'll ask him for sure.)
(Ah, I should get my stuff together.)
(Hmm, maybe I could try being more@thoughtful [wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]like Hayato...)
No, it can't be[chara:302301:lipSynch_0]...@[wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_1][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]You've gotta be kidding me!
(Wh-wh-what am I gonna dooo?! What if Hayato@finds it?)
So...this is what Aimi is really like...

group_1.textRight: Hey, I'm back.

group_1.textLeft: (Where is it... I had it when I left school,@I know I did.)

group_1.textRight: Aimi? Hellooo?
Your notebook? Is it important?

group_1.textLeft: I cant explain why, but it's an important@notebook for my future with Hayato.
(Well, it's full of very important, top@secret fantasies, anyway.)

group_1.textRight: Let's go look for it!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, but...it's already late.[chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_1][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1] I don't want@to bother you...

group_1.textRight: You said it was important though![chara:300201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300201:cheek_0][chara:300201:motion_200][chara:300201:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:300201:lipSynch_1] We have to@find it!
I still have some time!

group_1.textCenter: What am I gonna do?! For real, what should@I do?!
